extension.news: v1.7.4+matrix.1 (22.11.2023) - Fix sport categories v1.7.3+matrix.1 (26.8.2023) - Minor code changes - New fanart v1.7.2+matrix.1 (18.7.2023) - Add new country infolabel - New artwork (landscape, keyart) - Minor fixes/changes v1.7.1+matrix.1 (8.7.2023) - Add new premiered infolabel to tvshows - Limit used artwork quality to same as d+ website v1.7.0+matrix.1 (4.7.2023) - New feature: Automatic select for unwatched season and episode - Fix: Hardcoded resolutions for UHD and HD - Fix season markers when episode count is more than user is set to per page limit - Fix displaying playback progress without d+ sync - Load user data only once per listing (huge speed up for episode listings) - Option to logout v1.6.25+matrix.1 (26.6.2023) - Fix empty genres in d+ US - Show profile dialog after login (to prevent bypass PIN locked main profile) - Fix empty search query (Kodi getting stuck) v1.6.24+matrix.1 (21.7.2022) - Fix login v1.6.23+matrix.1 (1.7.2022) - Fix playback progress update after fastforward or rewind - Fix playback progress update when using Up Next v1.6.22+matrix.1 (29.5.2022) - Profiles and PIN code login for d+ India - Other minor changes v1.6.21+matrix.1 (28.4.2022) - New profiles dialog - PIN code login now checks code every 5 seconds (previously 10 sec) - Age limit for profile is shown on profiles dialog if kids profile - Other minor fixes v1.6.20+matrix.1 (23.4.2022) - Debug logging userdata and token request is now disabled v1.6.19+matrix.1 (15.4.2022) - Properly fixed PIN login v1.6.18+matrix.1 (15.4.2022) - Hotfix for PIN login v1.6.17+matrix.1 (15.4.2022) - Implement login with PIN code - Other minor fixes and changes v1.6.16+matrix.1 (21.2.2022) - Cache is no longer used in seasons page when sync playback and season markers is turned on.
